titleStmt.title: A chast mayd in Cheape-Side· A pleasant conceited comedy neuer before printed. As it hath beene often acted at the Swan on the Banke-side, by the Lady Elizabeth her Seruants. By Thomas Midelton Gent.
titleStmt.author: Middleton, Thomas, d. 1627.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Francis Constable dwelling at the signe of the Crane in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: the signe of the Crane in Pauls Church-yard
